remarks: The norm of the difference between two vectors.  (Contributed by NM, 1-Dec-2006.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
nvdif.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
nvdif.2 $e |- G = ( +v ` U ) $.
nvdif.4 $e |- S = ( .sOLD ` U ) $.
nvdif.6 $e |- N = ( normCV ` U ) $.
nvdif $p |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( N ` ( A G ( -u 1 S B ) ) ) = ( N ` ( B G ( -u 1 S A ) ) ) ) $.
